item.title: Hatsune Miku Performs Alongside Traditional Japanese Puppets – Free Stream!
item.dc:creator: nate
item.description:
With the generosity of Moi corporation, they will host a free stream of the performance: “BUNRAKU-beyond Ningyo Joruri x Hatsune Miku: Koi Musume Tsumugi no Labyrinth“. This will take place on Wednesday, January 20th, 2021 at 9:00PM (JST) on the TwitCasting livestreaming platform. The original performance was held on a unique, special stage at the …

The post Hatsune Miku Performs Alongside Traditional Japanese Puppets – Free Stream! appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
With the generosity of Moi corporation, they will host a free stream of the performance: “BUNRAKU-beyond Ningyo Joruri x Hatsune Miku: Koi Musume Tsumugi no Labyrinth“. This will take place on Wednesday, January 20th, 2021 at 9:00PM (JST) on the TwitCasting livestreaming platform.

The original performance was held on a unique, special stage at the Tomioka Silk Mill – noted as a World Heritage Site. On October 25th, 2020, this unique showcase featuring Hatsune Miku, Ningyo Joruri (Japanese traditional puppet theater), and classical music. Now we’ll get the opportunity to watch it!

～Hand-rolled and entwined threads. A love-hate musical strings the Edo to the Meiji eras～

Cast:

  • Hatsune Miku
  • Mikunano
  • Tamasuke Yoshida
  • Monkichi Kiritake
  • Tamahiko Yoshida
  • Kiyonosuke Toyomatsu
  • Gunma Symphony Orchestra Ensemble

Schedule:

Wednesday, January 20, 2021 — 9:00PM (JST) – 10:20PM (JST)
The archived video with comments/gifts will be available until January 19, 2022.

How to watch:

Head to the provided link upon event start!
Or, utilize the TwitCasting Viewer App available on iOS and Android.

Hope to see you there!

The post Hatsune Miku Performs Alongside Traditional Japanese Puppets – Free Stream! appeared first on VNN.

item.title: Stream Lia’s Live Solo Performance at the Zepp!
item.dc:creator: nate
item.description:
“Lia 20th BEST Special LIVE 2020” Coming from singing her debut, Torino Uta (from anime AIR), Lia is also known for singing the main theme songs of popular anime such as CLANNAD ~AFTER STORY~, Angel Beats!, Mekakucity Actors, and Charlotte! To celebrate her career 20th anniversary, she announced a new album, “Lia 20th Best“. This …

The post Stream Lia’s Live Solo Performance at the Zepp! appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
“Lia 20th BEST Special LIVE 2020”

Coming from singing her debut, Torino Uta (from anime AIR), Lia is also known for singing the main theme songs of popular anime such as CLANNAD ~AFTER STORY~, Angel Beats!, Mekakucity Actors, and Charlotte! To celebrate her career 20th anniversary, she announced a new album, “Lia 20th Best“. This live performance will feature Lia’s best hit show from December 6th, 2020.

You can purchase tickets while the archive period is up until 17:00 JST, December 20, 2020 and view the show as many times as you like until 23:59 JST, December 20, 2020. Those who wish to comment on the show can utilize the “#Lia20th” tag on Twitter.

Tickets

To purchase tickets to the show, head to this page which also includes more information regarding Lia and the show itself. They are being sold for ¥2,800. It’s a wonderful opportunity for fans so make sure to show your love and support!

Setlist

  1. Life is like a Melody
  2. Aozora(青空)
  3. Torino-Uta(鳥の詩)
  4. Kizunairo (絆色)
  5. Akai-yakusoku(赤い約束)
  6. doll
  7. Kokoro ni todoku uta(心に届く詩)
  8. Tazunebito(尋ねビト)
  9. Hoshino-Fune(星の舟)
  10. Saya’s Song
  11. Toki wo-kizamu uta(時を刻む唄)
  12. TORCH
  13. My Soul, Your Beats!
  14. Light colors
  15. Ichiban no-Takaramono(一番の宝物)
  16. Bravely You
  17. Farewell song

The post Stream Lia’s Live Solo Performance at the Zepp! appeared first on VNN.

item.title: VOCALOID Collection ~Winter 2020~ Fan Festival Announced!
item.dc:creator: nate
item.description:
Hello fellow Vocaloid fans! Dwango Co., Ltd, the operator of Japan’s social video website, Niconico, has announced details for the VOCALOID Collection ~Winter 2020~! It is set as an online convention, slated to be held on December 11 – December 13, 2020. Events The VOCALOID Collection LIVE The VOCALOID Collection LIVE is a music concert …

The post VOCALOID Collection ~Winter 2020~ Fan Festival Announced! appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
Hello fellow Vocaloid fans! Dwango Co., Ltd, the operator of Japan’s social video website, Niconico, has announced details for the VOCALOID Collection ~Winter 2020~! It is set as an online convention, slated to be held on December 11 – December 13, 2020.

Events

The VOCALOID Collection LIVE

The VOCALOID Collection LIVE is a music concert which will comprise of DJ shows and band programs, performed by popular artists including Hachioji P and Pinnochio P. The concert takes place on December 12th (Saturday), and will be divided into two sections: the first section will contain Vocaloid classics from 2009-2014, while the second section will cover Vocaloid trending music from 2015-2020.

Dates: December 12th (Saturday), 2020
Part 1: OPEN 12:00 JST, START 13:00 JST
Part 2: OPEN 17:30 JST, START 18:30 JST

Venue: Toyosu PIT (6-1-23, Toyosu, Koto-ku, Tokyo, Japan)

Price: Onsite Tickets
Part 1: 5,500 Yen (Tax Incl.)
Part 2: 5,500 Yen (Tax Incl.)
Both Part 1 and 2: 9,800 Yen (Tax Incl.)
Online Tickets
Part 1: 4,500 Yen (Tax Incl.)
Part 2: 4,500 Yen (Tax Incl.)
Both Part 1 and 2: 8,500 Yen (Tax Incl.)

Performer List:

  • Part 1: Kozue Aikawa, ＋α Alphakyun., 164, Iripon Sensei, Kamen Liar 217, koma’n, SHARE LOCK HOMES, Tsubasa Harihara (HarryP), PinocchioP, Heavenz, Miume, melochin, Sachiko Kobayashi, Kettaro, Tsukasashi, nero, NORISTRY, Rio
  • Part 2: ARIKU, Iripon Sensei, Will, Kamen Liar 217, Kanzawa Arisa, SHARE LOCK HOMES, john/TOOBOE, TUYU, DJ’TEKINA//SOMETHING a.k.a Yuyoyuppe, Hachioji P, Porushi, metre, melochin

Both online viewing and onsite viewing (at the physical venue) tickets can be purchased at Dwango Ticket.

Live Streaming Programs

Throughout the festival, there will be live streaming programs held, of which in particular include:

  • Talk shows
  • Outdoor DJ performances by popular Vocaloid P
  • A rebroadcast of Vocaloid music concerts held at Niconico Cho Party.
  • Introductory classes for Vocaloid music production!

Vocaloid Video Ranking Contest!

Niconico will be hosting a ranking contest while the event is taking place for Vocaloid videos posted by users! There will be 4 categories in the contest.

  1. Vocaloid Collection TOP 30 Ranking
  2. Vocaloid Collection REMIX Ranking
  3. Vocaloid Collection Rookie Ranking
  4. Derivative Works Ranking

The criteria for ranking includes views, comments, My Lists, and likes. Videos that make it to top ranking will then be featured in the official live stream show, and creators are eligible for cash prizes from Vocaloid Collection sponsors (details to be released on a later date). It will be open to all voice synth software, including: VOCALOID, UTAU, CeVIO, VOICEROID, NEUTRINO, SynthV, and Hatsune Miku NT.

Of note, the submission period for all ranking contests is: Dec. 11th (Friday) 0:00 JST – Dec. 13th (Sunday) 19:59 JST.
The contest will accept new videos only, and reuploads will not be included in the ranking.

Vocaloid Collection TOP 30 Ranking

  • Upload your original Vocaloid (or other voice synthesizer) music to the Music/Sound category on Niconico.
  • Tag the video with “ボカコレ2020冬” and lock it.

Vocaloid Collection REMIX Ranking

  • Upload your remix video based on original Vocaloid (or other voice synthesizer) music to the Music/Sound category on Niconico.
  • Tag the video with “ボカコレ2020冬REMIX” and lock it.

Vocaloid Collection Rookie Ranking

  • Rookie Ranking applies to new Vocaloid P, those who have uploaded their work no more than 2 years ago.
  • Upload your original Vocaloid (or other voice synthesizer) music to the Music/Sound category on NicoNico.
  • Tag the video with “ボカコレ2020冬ルーキー” and lock it.

Derivative Works Ranking

  • Consists of 3 genres:
    • Me Singing
    • Me Dancing
    • Me Playing
  • Upload your video based on original Vocaloid (or other voice synthesizer) music to Music/Sound or Dance categories on Niconico.
  • Tag the video with the designated tag as appropriate for the genre.
    • Me Singing Ranking: “歌ってみた”
    • Me Dancing Ranking: “踊ってみた”
    • Me Playing Ranking: “演奏してみた”

Stem Files for Remix are available from Popular Vocaloid P’s!

Producers such as ryo (supercell) and kz (livetune) will be sharing music stems from their original Vocaloid songs so users can make their own remixes. These will be available to download at Vocaloid Collection’s official website.

Those who make it to the top ranking with their remixes are going to be featured on the official live streamed event!

Artists Sharing Stem Files: ryo (supercell), kz (livetune), PinocchioP, ika, Omoi, Kairiki bear, Carlos Hakamada (SizeP), KurousaP, Surii, DECO*27, NayutalieN, Harumaki Gohan, buzzG, Hiiragi Kirai, and more!

To participate: Upload your remix to Niconico and tag it with “ボカコレ2020冬REMIX”. (We were not given information if you need to file it under the Music/Sound category, or lock the video itself).

40 Hours of Nonstop Vocaloid Music

What a party! Starting on Dec. 11th (Friday) at 23:00 JST, Niconico will stream a 40 hour Vocaloid music show consisting of three sections.

  1. Vocaloid Collection TOP 30 Cruise
  2. Vocaloid All Time Best Cruise (featuring iconic Vocaloid music)
  3. User Request Cruise (music requested by users)

User Playlist Recommendations

During the event period, Niconico wants users to submit their own Vocaloid playlist to have the opportunity to be featured on the Vocaloid Collection’s official website.

To participate: Submit a playlist of at least 10 Vocaloid (or other voice synthesizer) songs created using Niconico’s My List function and post the URL on Twitter with the hashtag #私のプレイリスト and #ボカコレ.

…But what about merch??

The BOOTH Festival Vocaloid Collection

International indie art marketplace, BOOTH, is hosting the BOOTH FESTIVAL Vocaloid Collection – an online convention dedicated to Vocaloid merchandise! During the Vocaloid Collection event, creators will sell their indie music CDs, comics, photo books, and more on a dedicated webpage.

If you’re a creator and want to apply for participation before or during the event, check the official website for more details.

Get Hyped for Vocaloid Collection ~Winter 2020~!

With so much to do, you’ll find there’s something for everyone to enjoy! I’m happy that there’s a lot of emphasis towards user generated content, as you can see with the multitude of different contests that will take place. Let us know what will you check out in this festival!

Links

  • Vocaloid Collection ~Winter 2020~
  • Vocaloid Collection Official Twitter
  • Vocaloid Collection Live: Tickets
  • Niconico
  • BOOTH Festival: Vocaloid Collection

The post VOCALOID Collection ~Winter 2020~ Fan Festival Announced! appeared first on VNN.

item.title: “BUNRAKU Beyond” LIVE Broadcast Has Been Cancelled Too!
item.dc:creator: Spookie
item.description:
Hey everyone! Two days ago we reported that the “Ningyo Joruri x Hatsune Miku – BUNRAKU Beyond” show was cancelled due to the COVID-19 pandemic affecting the world and that a livestream show would be taking its place. However, today it was announced that said live broadcast has been cancelled as well. In an official …

The post “BUNRAKU Beyond” LIVE Broadcast Has Been Cancelled Too! appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
Hey everyone!

Two days ago we reported that the “Ningyo Joruri x Hatsune Miku – BUNRAKU Beyond” show was cancelled due to the COVID-19 pandemic affecting the world and that a livestream show would be taking its place. However, today it was announced that said live broadcast has been cancelled as well.

In an official statement on the Hatsune Miku Official Blog, organizers said the following:

“Regarding the performance of “Ningyo Joruri x Hatsune Miku – BUNRAKU Beyond”, we have continued to make adjustments to distribute live audience performances via streaming but due to the expanding infectious state of the coronavirus disease we have decided, at the request of Tokyo’s Governor Koike, to cancel the scheduled live video distribution.

COVID-19 has made it impossible for us to provide live audiences and performers the required safety on a health standpoint.

We deeply apologize to many of you who were looking forward to our show.”

Refunds

Nico Nico Live Broadcasting
For users who have already purchased the livestream ticket for the show, your Nico Nico Points will be returned soon as possible. Once the Nic0 Nico Points have been returned, we will contact you with the email address you’ve registered at the time of your purchase.

We urge you to wait until you’re contacted.

TwitCasting
Refunds will be issued via bank transfer from S.A.P.

Click here for more details.

Sources

Hatsune Miku Official Twitter

The post “BUNRAKU Beyond” LIVE Broadcast Has Been Cancelled Too! appeared first on VNN.

item.title: Information For Nico Nico Net Super Conference 2020 Revealed!
item.dc:creator: Spookie
item.description:
Hello everyone! Today I’ll be showing you all the information regarding the “Nico Nico Net Super Conference 2020” which was revealed not long ago! Super Kabuki 2020 Main Visual  Introducing “VOCALOID Fes” VOCALOID Fes is a live show focused on VOCALOID music. Various VOCALOID characters will make their appearance on “VOCALOID Live“. Other shows like …

The post Information For Nico Nico Net Super Conference 2020 Revealed! appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
Hello everyone!

Today I’ll be showing you all the information regarding the “Nico Nico Net Super Conference 2020” which was revealed not long ago!

Super Kabuki 2020 Main Visual 

Introducing “VOCALOID Fes”

VOCALOID Fes is a live show focused on VOCALOID music.

Various VOCALOID characters will make their appearance on “VOCALOID Live“. Other shows like “VOCALOID DJ” will be featured as well.

You can watch VOCALOID Fes live on the net! More details on this are available by reading our article here.

“Nico Nico Net Super Conference 2020”

The “Nico Nico Net Super Conference 2020” is scheduled to be take place April 12 to April 19, 2020! Eight days of pure VOCALOID fun!

During the event, at the top part of the Nico Nico official website will feature what’s called the “Net Super Meeting Room“, where various entertainment companies existing in Japan will gather with the aim to become Japan’s largest internet festival.

In addition, this event will go beyond Nico Nico to form alliances with various media sites and companies in order to expand Japanese net culture to the world. Details will be announced at a later date.

Nico Nico Net Super Conference 2020 Sponsored by NTT

  • Date: April 12 to April 19, 2020
  • Organizer: Nico Nico Super Conference Executive Committee
  • Super Special Sponsor: NTT
  • Official Website: Here
  • Official Twitter: Here

Sponsors List

Super Special Sponsor: NTT

Sponsored by VOCALOID Fes: Tobu Top Tours Co., Ltd.

Other Sponsors: Airbnb / # Compass-Battle Providence Analysis System

Super Kabuki Supported by NTT Performance Overview

  • Performance Name: おとぎぞうしこいのすがたえ
  • Broadcast Date and Time:

April 18, 2020 @ 14:00 PM JPT: “Super Kabuki 2020” Nico Nico Douga
April 19, 2020 @ 18:00 PM JPT: “Super Kabuki 2020” Nico Nico Douga

  • Performers: Shido Nakamura, Miku Hatsune, Butterfly Nakamura, Kuniya Sawamura and others
  • Screenplay: Ryo Matsuoka
  • Director: Kanjuro Fujima
  • Song: “Romeo and Cinderella”
  • Organizer: Nico Nico Super Conference Executive Committee
  • Production: Shochiku Co., Ltd./Dwango Co., Ltd.
  • Production Assistance: Crypton Future Media Co., Ltd.
  • Super Special Sponsor / Technical Assistance: NTT

Check out the “Super Kabuki 2020” Official Website for more information.

VOCALOID Fes

“Vocaloid Live”

Performers: Hatsune Miku, Kagamine Rin, Kagamine Len, Gumi, Otomachi Una, flower, Yukari Yuzuki

“Vocaloid DJ”

Dates & Times: April 18, 2020 @ 18:00 – 20:20 PM JPT
1) 18:00 – 18:45 PM JPT – “sasakure.UK & Pinocchiopie” Live DJ (Free)
2) 18:45 – 19:50 PM JPT – “flower & Yukari Yukari” Live DJ (Free)
3) 19:50 – 20:20 PM JPT – VOCALOID Live (Paid)

Click here for more details!

Ticket Price: ¥ 4,800 (tax included)

Click here for relevant information regarding ticket purchasing.

“VOCALOID Fes Merchandise”

VOCALOID Fes’ exceptional merchandise will be available for purchase for everybody!

These include but are not limited to:

  • Limited Edition Illustration designed by popular artist “Yasan“
  • T-shirt (M / L / XL size): 2,800 yen (tax included)
  • Muffler Towel: 1,500 yen (tax included)
  • Acrylic Stand Key Holders: 800 yen (tax included)

Sources

Hatsune Miku Official Blog

The post Information For Nico Nico Net Super Conference 2020 Revealed! appeared first on VNN.

item.title: “BUNRAKU Beyond” Event Has Been Cancelled!
item.dc:creator: Spookie
item.description:
The “BUNRAKU Beyond” event has been officially cancelled by the organizers due to the new COVID-19 pandemic. However, it was decided that a live video performance will take place instead. In response to a request from the Japanese government to prevent the spread of the new coronavirus sickness, the organizer has considered not to hold …

The post “BUNRAKU Beyond” Event Has Been Cancelled! appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
The “BUNRAKU Beyond” event has been officially cancelled by the organizers due to the new COVID-19 pandemic. However, it was decided that a live video performance will take place instead.

In response to a request from the Japanese government to prevent the spread of the new coronavirus sickness, the organizer has considered not to hold a “BUNRAKU Beyond” performance on March 29. As it was determined that the pandemic that’s occurring worldwide was too severe, the decision to cancel the event was made as a way to safeguard everybody’s health.

Following the cancellation of this performance, the organizers will be distributing a part of the program as a paid live video event so that fans can see “Ningyo Joruri and Hatsune Miku Competition” on March 29, the original performance date (the time is yet to be confirmed).

There’s plans to mail “BUNRAKU Beyond” goodies and merchandise as well, with details being announced on the SAP website in the near future.

Refund Information

Customers purchasing at the SAP Ticket Store can request a refund here.

Lawson Ticket holders can request their refund here. (Refund period from March 14 @ 15:00 PM JPT until April 17 @ 18:00 PM JPT)

Organizer’s Message

“We are planning to have a collaborative performance with Ningyo Joruri. Ticket purchases for this performance will be announced on the SAP website when the performance details and date have been confirmed.”

Sources

Hatsune Miku Official Blog

The post “BUNRAKU Beyond” Event Has Been Cancelled! appeared first on VNN.

item.title: MIKUEXPO 2020 USA & Canada Tour New Dates Announced!
item.dc:creator: Spookie
item.description:
New dates for the MIKUEXPO 2020 USA & Canada tour have been finally announced after being postponed due to the COVID-19 pandemic. Hatsune Miku’s appearance in Coachella, one of the largest music festivals in the United States, which has been postponed due to the spread of the new disease Coronavirus (COVID-19) has been rescheduled as …

The post MIKUEXPO 2020 USA & Canada Tour New Dates Announced! appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
New dates for the MIKUEXPO 2020 USA & Canada tour have been finally announced after being postponed due to the COVID-19 pandemic.

Hatsune Miku’s appearance in Coachella, one of the largest music festivals in the United States, which has been postponed due to the spread of the new disease Coronavirus (COVID-19) has been rescheduled as well.

All tickets already purchased will be honored for the rescheduled dates. 

MIKUEXPO 2020 USA & Canada new tour dates are as follows:

Be advised that because of how fast the new disease spreads, and this is from the official source, these events could be postponed again to ensure the health and safety of all attendees if the situation with COVID-19 worsens in the coming months.

We hope that everybody will try their best to prevent the spread of the infection by thoroughly washing their hands and following all recommended instructions.

Links

HATSUNE MIKU EXPO 2020 USA & Canada Official Website (English)

HATSUNE MIKU EXPO Official Twitter Account (English)

The post MIKUEXPO 2020 USA & Canada Tour New Dates Announced! appeared first on VNN.

item.title: HATSUNE MIKU “Digital Stars 2020 Japan Tour” Has Been Postponed!
item.dc:creator: Spookie
item.description:
In light of the recent medical events that’s affecting the population worldwide with the Coronavirus, the people at Crypton Future Media Inc. released a statement today regarding the status of the HATSUNE MIKU “Digital Stars 2020 Japan Tour” event. 【HATSUNE MIKU Digital Stars 2020 Japan Tour 開催延期のお知らせ】 新型コロナウイルスの感染拡大の影響を鑑み、ファンの皆様および出演者の健康と安全を最優先に考慮して、開催を延期させていただくことを決定いたしました。何卒ご理解賜りますようお願い申し上げます。#DigitalStars#初音ミク pic.twitter.com/53EmTkNa5X — HATSUNE MIKU Digital Stars 2020 …

The post HATSUNE MIKU “Digital Stars 2020 Japan Tour” Has Been Postponed! appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
In light of the recent medical events that’s affecting the population worldwide with the Coronavirus, the people at Crypton Future Media Inc. released a statement today regarding the status of the HATSUNE MIKU “Digital Stars 2020 Japan Tour” event.

【HATSUNE MIKU Digital Stars 2020 Japan Tour 開催延期のお知らせ】

新型コロナウイルスの感染拡大の影響を鑑み、ファンの皆様および出演者の健康と安全を最優先に考慮して、開催を延期させていただくことを決定いたしました。
何卒ご理解賜りますようお願い申し上げます。#DigitalStars#初音ミク pic.twitter.com/53EmTkNa5X

— HATSUNE MIKU Digital Stars 2020 Japan Tour (@mikuexpo_jp) February 21, 2020

The show which was scheduled to be held from May 15 to May 23, 2020, has been suspended by the spread of the new Coronavirus disease (COVID-19) and to give top priority to the health and safety of the fans and performers because of this.

Along with this postponement, the release of the “HATSUNE MIKU Digital Stars 2020 Compilation” CD, which was scheduled to be released in conjunction with this event, has also been postponed.

The new date will be announced on the official website and Twitter as soon as it is decided.

Links

Digital Stars 2020 Japan Tour Official Website

Digital Stars 2020 Japan Tour on Twitter

The post HATSUNE MIKU “Digital Stars 2020 Japan Tour” Has Been Postponed! appeared first on VNN.

item.title: Hatsune Miku x Kodo Special Live 2020 Announced For June 2020!
item.dc:creator: Spookie
item.description:
Hatsune Miku will once again be performing a collaboration special live with Kodo, Japan’s internationally famous taiko drumming group, as one of the “This is NIPPON Premium Theater” series showing fascinating Japanese arts and culture as part of the Tokyo 2020 official program. The special live show will be held at NHK Hall in Shibuya, …

The post Hatsune Miku x Kodo Special Live 2020 Announced For June 2020! appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
Hatsune Miku will once again be performing a collaboration special live with Kodo, Japan’s internationally famous taiko drumming group, as one of the “This is NIPPON Premium Theater” series showing fascinating Japanese arts and culture as part of the Tokyo 2020 official program.

The special live show will be held at NHK Hall in Shibuya, Tokyo on June 20th~21st, 2020 and with tickets, ranging from 6,500 yen to 8,000 yen (tax included), opening on March 11, 2020 at 10:00 AM JPT for the general public.

Stay tuned for more information!

【先行予約開始しました！】
本日11時から「初音ミク×鼓童　スペシャルライブ2020」チケット先行予約を開始しました！詳しくはチケットぴあの専用ページをご確認ください♪みなさんと一緒に会場で盛り上がるのを楽しみにしています！https://t.co/yJV1UugjmS#kodomiku #初音ミク #鼓童

— 初音ミク×鼓童スペシャルライブ公式 (@kodo_miku) February 10, 2020

Sources

Official Website: http://kodo-miku.com/
Official Twitter: https://twitter.com/kodo_miku

The post Hatsune Miku x Kodo Special Live 2020 Announced For June 2020! appeared first on VNN.
